docs.snippet: WHITE PLAINS, N.Y., Sept. 16--Fifty-eight students, newly arrived from fourteen, countries, were entertained here today at a "world student week-end" party before matriculating at American colleges and universities under scholarships obtained for...
docs.lead_paragraph: WHITE PLAINS, N.Y., Sept. 16--Fifty-eight students, newly arrived from fourteen, countries, were entertained here today at a "world student week-end" party before matriculating at American colleges and universities under scholarships obtained for them by the Institute of International Education, New York.
docs.abstract: 58 under Internatl Educ Inst program feted

docs.snippet: ATLANTA, Ga., Sept. 16--The biggest slice of the huge white and gold frosted birthday cake that marked the golden jubilee of the United States Golf Association's women's championship today went to Miss Beverly Hanson of Fargo, N.D.

docs.snippet: The General Assembly of the United Nations began its 1950 session at Flushing Meadow yesterday with the overwhelming rejection of Indian and Soviet proposals for the admission of Communist China to the Assembly and to other United Nations organs.
